resources.string: Software Engineer at Faculty of Computers and Informations Cairo University, Computer Sciense department
Click on Phone number to make call

This is an android mobile application which allows doctors to receive messages on mobile, when drug prices are changed, or news about a new drug that became available in the Egyptian markets.\n This is done by notification on the mobile, and through the application also be possible to communicate with your friends through the chat service, or invite your friends on social networks to use this application.
Here You Will see the new news
